title: BBC Local Live: Nottinghamshire on Thursday 12 January 2017 - BBC News
summary: 'crusader against muslims ' jailed over home-made explosives .
nolan new notts county boss after takeover .
woman hurt in police car crash .

documents.title: breakingnolan named new notts county manager
text: breakingnolan named new notts county manager

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for nottinghamshire have finished for the day but we 'll be back tomorrow morning with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather .

documents.title: weather : temperatures will drop tonight
text: very cold overnight and a few evening snow showers are possible .
temperatures will drop quickly to freezing so ice will form on untreated surfaces where roads are wet from earlier rain .
a band of .
sleet and snow will briefly pass through just before dawn .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: reporter lands in italy
text: nottingham panthers reporter owen bradley has made his way to ritten in italy today for this weekend 's continental cup final which gets going tomorrow .
greetings from ritten .
# panthersnation # eihl

documents.title: buses have changed a bit since the 90s
text: # throwbackthursday earlier this week we launched our posh new buses on # thenines .
in 1991 this is how we all got from derby to mansfield .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid to be fair , they did look smart
is the 141 ever going to get new buses ?
its the route that santa clause forgot !

documents.title: travel : more accidents in the evening rush hour
text: there are delays on most services as a result of these rtcs and another earlier rtc on shakespeare street .

documents.title: could nolan still play at notts ?
text: nolan said his boots are `` half hung up '' and that he feels like he can still play .
he said that fans may see him back on the pitch and refused to rule out the possibility of being a player-manager at notts .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: nolan hoping to prove himself
text: kevin nolan is now facing the press and said sam allardyce encouraged him to take the job..
he 's said he is `` looking forward to the challenge '' at the club and that his experience at leyton orient made him more hungry to prove himself .
nolan said : `` i 'm expecting the lads to give me 100 % every day until the end of the season '' .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: travel : accident in city centre causing delays
text: rtc on collin street taking out two lanes .
also , rtc on maid marian way southbound near castle gate taking out one lane .
expect delays

documents.title: hardy : buying club was 90 % heart
text: hardy has told the press conference : `` the decision to buy the club is 90 % heart and 10 % head . ''
he said that players will have a `` fresh start '' and added : `` but i think we maybe need an extra player or two . ''
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: hardy : embargo ca n't be lifted until 'huge ' debt paid
text: new notts county owner hardy said he was hopeful of catching the last seven days of the transfer window but said a debt classed as `` huge '' needed to be paid before the embargo can be lifted .

documents.title: judge : explosives man had 'warped world view '
text: the judge told smith : `` in your warped view of the world , you were preparing for the possibility of a local war with islamic terrorists .
`` in your own obsessive and misguided way , you were preparing for a fight that you believed to come . ''
author: Jeremy Ball
Social affairs correspondent, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: smith believed he was 'crusader against muslims '
text: police seized gunpowder and a stockpile of chemicals from roger smith 's home in clifton .
nottingham crown court heard that smith was an `` eccentric loner '' who saw himself as a `` crusader against muslims '' .
smith was found guilty of two offences of possessing explosives and a separate charge of possessing a document for terrorist purposes ( the anarchy cookbook version 2000 ) .
the prosecution accepted that he was n't preparing an act of terrorism .
author: Jeremy Ball
Social affairs correspondent, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: breakingclifton man jailed over home-made explosives
text: a survivalist from nottingham has been jailed for four years , for making explosives and downloading a terrorist manual .
roger smith , 46 , from clifton , claimed he wanted to protect the uk from the so-called islamic state .
author: Jeremy Ball
Social affairs correspondent, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: hardy : nolan is `` outstanding leader ''
text: alan hardy has told the press conference at meadow lane that kevin nolan is an `` outstanding leader '' which is `` what the club needs '' .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
text: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: watchdog calls for witnesses to come forward
text: the ipcc says it has started to gather cctv , footage from officers ' body cameras and data from the police car following the crash in radford last night .

commissioner derrick campbell said : this happened during the busy rush hour and we know a tram and a bus had both stopped close to where the collision occurred , so there are many potential witnesses .
`` we intend to carry out a thorough investigation and would urge anyone we have not yet spoken to who saw any part of this incident to contact us without delay . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: press waits for new notts owner
text: i 'm down at meadow lane for the start of the new era at notts .
new owner alan hardy is expected shortly
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Radio Nottingham sports reporter

documents.title: mp adds to tributes for england manager
text: bassetlaw mp john mann has paid tribute to graham taylor too .
in a statement , he said : `` i am saddened by graham taylor 's untimely death .
he was a great football figure and always supportive of local football .
my thoughts are with his family and friends . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: plane was badly damaged in crash
text: the air accidents investigation branch ( aaib ) report said the 69-year-old pilot tried to climb the plane when he spotted the van during takeoff .
no-one was injured in the crash but the plane was `` damaged beyond economic repair '' .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: pilot tried to avoid council van crash
text: a pilot whose light aircraft hit a moving van during takeoff at lambley airstrip , had attempted to manoeuvre around the vehicle , an air accident report has said .
the socata tb9 `` clipped '' the nottinghamshire county council van at the end of the airstrip on 24 march .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: family 'devastated ' by sudden death
text: mr taylor 's family have released a statement following his death today .
they said : `` with the greatest sadness , we have to announce that graham passed away at his home early this morning of a suspected heart attack .
`` the family are devastated by this sudden and totally unexpected loss . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: showers could turn into snow later
text: snow showers are starting to come down from the north-west and the rain across the south will possibly turn to snow this afternoon across parts of the east midlands .
we 'd love to see your photos if it snows where you are .
email or tweet them .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: taylor inherited love of game from father
text: graham taylor was born on september 15 1944 in worksop to his mother dorothy , a postwoman , and father thomas , a sports reporter for the scunthorpe evening telegraph - which is where he got his love for football .
the family later moved to scunthorpe where mr taylor joined the youth team .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: council to pay for hospital officers
text: the police support officers at the hospitals are being paid for by ashfield district council .
in a statement , councillor jim aspinall said they were giving people additional support to quit smoking in the new year .

he added : `` the council is conscious that health and wellbeing is a major contributing factor to achieving a vibrant place to live and is very supportive of schemes such as this , which contribute to the health and happiness of our residents . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: forest star pays tribute to taylor
text: extremely saddened to hear the news that graham taylor has passed away .
genuinely kind and funny man , condolences to his family and friends .
signed platt , yorke and mcgrath for @ twitterid - possibly our 3 best players over last 30 years
from last tweet , he came up & sat with me & dad for 10 minutes discussing england & wolves jobs , brought me down a peg or two
i recall calling him turnip when he was at watford as he walked around the pitch , steward opened gate & up he came to see me
@ twitterid everyone @ twitterid saying the same thing nice guy , gent etc
he always seemed such a gent .
he was treated appallingly by the tabloids when he had england job
the work he did at @ twitterid and @ twitterid will always be a part of history , # neverforgotten # rip
i wonder what hypocrisy # dontbuythesun will run with .
ridiculed a very good man & manager .
thoughts with his family & friends
i shall always remember graham for bringing to villa a then unknown david platt and for rescuing paul mcgrath 's career .
graham taylor should always be remembered as a great aston villa manager in his first spell in charge between 1987 and 1990
i bet the same rags that slaughtered him will post their `` tributes '' now .
an excellent football man , treated so shamefully .
so sad to hear this .
regularly bumped into him & his wife walking their 2 dogs in the park .
such a nice , pleasant , decent bloke .
rip .
he was a football man through and through .
thoroughly decent dignified bloke .
it 's a big shame the english media did not show him the same respect when he was england boss , as what they have today .
nice one heard he was a real task master early days at watford
a sad day indeed .
i 'm sure there will be a great response on saturday 's wolves v villa game
likeable guy rip
r.i.p legend
r.i.p
was news
sad news

documents.title: breakingformer england boss dies
text: worksop-born graham taylor has died at the age of 72 .
he was england manager from 1990 to 1993 .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: patient hopes officers can change attitudes
text: patient debra barlow told bbc radio nottingham it made her angry to see people ignoring the rules and signs telling people not to smoke outside the hospitals .
`` it 's obvious the hospital is smoke-free , '' she said .
`` and i think people should respect that . ''
she thinks having the police support officers will help reduce the number of people smoking outside the entrances .
she added : `` we have to get people 's minds to change you come to hospital to get better and for health reasons and we all know how badly cigarettes affect our health . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: hospitals take stand against smokers
text: fed up of people smoking outside hospitals in nottinghamshire , police support officers are now being brought in to stop the problem .
smoking outside the king 's mill , newark and mansfield hospitals was banned 10 years ago .
but the trust that runs them says the rule has been unenforceable for the past decade , so it 's now taking action .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: travel : a52 reopens after earlier accident
text: recovery now complete on # a52 westbound between # m1 and # borrowash near # derby following the earlier serious incident .
delays are clearing .

documents.title: how cold is it where you are ?
text: if you 're worrying about it snowing later where you are , spare a thought for people in canada and russia , where it 's close to -30 and lower !
you can use this postcode guide to see how cold it is where you are compared to other parts of the world .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: police had been responding to call
text: nottinghamshire police have now told us the officers in the car had been on their way to a report of a burglary when the crash happened close to the whitmoor tram stop in radford .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: woman seriously hurt in police car crash
text: police say a 46-year-old woman who was hurt in a crash with a police car in wilkinson street , radford last night , remains in a serious condition in hospital .
the force said she suffered serious injuries and supt simon firth , added : `` our thoughts are very much with the lady involved and her family at this difficult time . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
text: latest headlines for nottinghamshire
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: travel : more misery on a52 near stapleford
text: just heard that the a52 to nottingham is down to one lane following a crash between two vans , causing yet more problems to all services
did n't think it was friday 13th until tomorrow , has someone been messing with the calendar ?

documents.title: ice could cause problems in nottinghamshire tonight
text: falling temperatures will lead to # ice forming rapidly on untreated surfaces tonight .
warnings have been issued
yah boo !
not listening

documents.title: recognition for city music venues
text: three nottingham venues have been named as among the best in the country for live grassroots music .
rock city , the rescue rooms and the bodega came on top in the east midlands in a study by the listings website ents 24 .
all three sites are owned by dhp family , which also runs nottingham 's splendour festival .
author: Kevin Stanley
Reporter, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: concerns for missing woman
text: police say they are concerned for the welfare of 30-year-old jeaneatte ashford .

she was last seen in the bestwood village area on tuesday afternoon and officers want to speak to anyone who has had contact with her , seen her , or seen her car - a white suzuki splash with the registration plate sj13 eyc .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: new owners for donington park
text: donington park has new owners - it 's been bought by the company motorsport vision .
msv is owned by the former f1 driver jonathan palmer and sir peter ogden - they already own brands hatch , oulton park , snetterton and cadwell park .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingdonington park takeover announced
text: a motor-racing company co-owned by former f1 driver jonathan palmer has agreed a takeover deal for donington park .
author: BBC Radio Leicester

documents.title: police watchdog investigates crash
text: the ipcc has started an investigation into the crash between a police car and a woman in radford last night .
in a statement , it said : `` we deployed investigators straight away to carry out an assessment , and have since begun an independent investigation into the circumstances of the collision . ''
author: Sarah Teale
Reporter, East Midlands Today

documents.title: slight change
text: dave has gone off to work on something else so it will be me writing the updates for the rest of today .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: notts confirm new owner
text: notts county have confirmed alan hardy 's purchase of the club .
in a statement he said : `` we have a huge amount of work to undertake and it is crucial that everyone connected with the club pulls together in the same direction .
`` i wish to pay thanks to all notts supporters for their backing , encouragement and humour in recent weeks and months . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: woman injured in a52 crash
text: police have given us a little more information on this morning 's crash which has closed the a52 between the m1 and borrowash .
they say it involved a female driver whose peugeot 206 hit the central reservation shortly before 06:00 .
she 's now in hospital with non life-threatening injuries .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: lawrence 'smelly pangbourne ' letter sells for £ 1,000
text: we told you earlier this week about a letter written by dh lawrence that was going up for auction .
in it he described the berkshire village of pangbourne as `` smelly '' and `` repulsive '' .
well it sold yesterday at an auctioneers in edinburgh for £ 1,000 .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a52 'to reopen at 12:00 '
text: as you might have read in that tweet below , it 's looking like the road 's going to remain shut for another couple of hours .
incredible that no one was badly hurt in the crash .
recovery is continuing on the # a52 westbound , which remains closed between the # m1 and # borrowash .
see :
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

text: # a52 update .
no life changing / threatening injuries .
carriageway will remain closed until midday for recovery , clean up & road repairs .
thank you for everyone 's help on scene from dr r from @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid
you only crash when you run out of space somebody got something very wrong
busy road for you today as another rtc in opposite direction just before m1 earlier
@ twitterid
are we able to use these images on our website ?

BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : rubberneckers causing a52 delays
text: drivers slowing to look at the accident on the westbound side between the m1 and borrowash are causing delays on the eastbound side .
author: BBC Travel

text: in derbyshire finally
moved a few yards and now we have come to a halt again .
one lane closed resulting in a long queue of traffic up the a52 .

documents.title: traffic still not moving on a52
text: so an hour and a half later and i am still stuck on brian clough way .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: forest takeover 'by the weekend '
text: there have been no further developments on the potential takeover of nottingham forest by the american , john jay moores .
reports in the usa suggest that it 's hoped a deal will go through by the weekend .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: police checking road is safe before reopening
text: they want witnesses to the crash to call them on 101 .
thank you for your patience and understanding .
we appreciate it 's rush hour and people need to go about their journeys but we have to be satisfied the carriageway is safe . ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a52 crash : driver taken to hospital
text: we 've had another update from derbyshire police over the closure between borrowash and the m1 .
a spokeswoman said a car hit the central reservation about 06:00 .
the driver has been taken to hospital .
to compound problems , a car broke down while waiting in the queuing traffic and is awaiting recovery .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a52 traffic backing up on m1
text: here 's the view from the highways england traffic cameras at junction 25 of the m1 , where the a52 closure is in place
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: magpies : nolan bookies ' favourite
text: as bookmakers make kevin nolan favourite for the notts county job , here 's former player mark stallard on his relative lack of experience
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

text: here 's how it 's looking today

BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: radford police car crash : ipcc told
text: we understand that the independent police complaints commission has been informed about the crash involving a police car last night .
we 're still waiting to hear on the condition of the woman who was hit .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a52 closure affecting buses
text: not much fun for bus commuters either this morning
a52 closure causing delays on alternative routes , worst affected seem to be near stapleford and long eaton , delays to # i4 , # eighteen , # my15

documents.title: magpies owner late for first day
text: traffic problems seem to be affecting just about everyone in nottingham today , including notts county 's new owner - on his first day !
not a great start !
colwick loop-road solid and now late for 8am photo shoot !
when 's the new bridge going in over the trent at netherfield ?
hi alan , still expecting to name new manager today ?
2pm press conference
first full day in a new job and late in .
not acceptable
clearly that monorail needs to be built now .
on second thoughts , get a couple of stubbsesque , rough tough defenders eh ?
late in , first day of a new job ! !
obviously you do n't regularly travel on loop road at 8am oh well you are the owner # boooooom
ppppppp
will you be doing a chicken dance in this photo shoot ?
will this traffic jam delay the announcement of a new manager ?
time for the new monorail then ?
should be a bridge there would make life alot easier

BBC Local Live

text: think it 's going to be a long morning stuck on the a52

documents.title: m1 slip road shut
text: an update from police here
we are dealing with a collision and a broken down car on the a52 at borrowash .
the a52 slip road at m1 j25 is closed .
traffic is backing up .
is it cleared up yet ?
traffic is still heavy .
if you can avoid the area we 'd recommend you do so .
which side is it ?
heading towards nottingham or heading towards derby ?
the incident happened on the westbound carriageway ( towards derby ) between m1 and borrowash .
for further updates : @ twitterid

BBC Local Live

documents.title: a52 closure : diversion in place
text: drivers are being asked to follow the hollow diamond symbol , which will lead you along the m1 southbound , a50 , a6 and a511 back to the a52 at derby .
the # a52 near # derby remains closed westbound between the # m1 and # borrowash due to a serious incident .
diversion :
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: woman hurt in radford police car collision
text: a woman is in hospital after being hit by a police car on its way to a call-out yesterday evening .
it happened on wilkinson street in radford at about 18:45 .
she was taken to the queen 's medical centre for treatment but we 've not yet been told about her condition .
roads in the area were closed after the crash but have since reopened and it 's not affecting the tram .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a52 closed
text: long delays on the a52 as it 's been closed westbound between the m1 junction 25 and cole lane in borrowash .
it 's because of an accident and a car fire .
congestion is back to the bramcote island .
author: BBC Travel
